answers.label: ANSWERS
answers.title: Answers per day
answers.subtitle: Children up to 1.200 questions a day in the Evolytes

minutes.label: MINUTES
minutes.title: Average time spent
minutes.subtitle: Children spend on average 26 minutes each time they open the game

research.subtitle: Evolytes is based on 3 years of interdisciplinary research in computer science and psychology to make learning fun, engaging and improving skill acquisition. The results of the experiment behind the Evolytes platform exceeded our wildest expectations
research.answers12: Children with learning disabilities showed the greatest growth throughout the study
research.answers1200: Children answered up to 1.200 questions a day in the Evolytes game in their own free time by their own volution
research.answers4: Children answered on average 4x more questions in Evolytes than at school throughout the study

theory.reinforcementDescription: Makes the game entertaining and rewards students to keep them engaged
theory.flowDescription: Is used to adapt to the skill level of each and every student to maximize their potential
theory.spacingDescription: Ensures long term learning and skill acquisition by spacing practice
theory.skillDescription: We use new developments in skill acquisition research to measure and asses skills
theory.multimodalDescription: By learning in different environments students are better at recalling those skills in real life
theory.mindsetDescription: We use the growth mindset to asses and display student progress in the platform

books.subtitle: The Evolytes books are specifically designed to practice reading and writing skills in a fun and unique way
books.skillsSubtitle: The books are designed to practice reading and writing skills to improve learning outcomes
books.integrationSubtitle: The books integrate with the game through chapter exams which makes learning fun and engaging
books.rewardsSubtitle: Children are rewarded in the game for working in the books which makes them excited to learn math in books!

integrationGame.title: All Evolyte books integrate with the game in a unique way
integrationGame.subtitle: The evolytes books integrate with the game through QR codes followed by an exam. If they answer it correctly they get in game rewards to keep them motivated!
integrationGame.step1Description: Students learn how to solve new problems in the Evolytes books in each chapter
integrationGame.step2Description: At the end of the chapter you scan the QR code to get an exam from the chapter to get rewards
integrationGame.step3Description: Finish the exam successfully and the student gets rewards for finishing the chapter
integrationGame.step4Description: In the monitor you can see how your child is advancing in the books and which chapters they have finished or are struggling with

shop.subtitle: We offer several books for different ages and skill levels. We are constantly adding new books with new features, animals and adventures.
shop.errorFetchBook: Sorry, something's wrong during the fetch of the books

features.title: Features
features.description: The Evolytes books offer various unique features to make learning math fun and engaging through the Evolytes universe

feature1.title: Improved learning outcomes and positive attitude towards math
feature1.description1: Students learn math in a fun way in the books through the Evolytes and get unique information about different Evolytes.
feature1.description2: By integrating the books with the game students finish the Evolytes books in record time, improve learning outcomes and become more positive towards math.

feature2.title: Designed to teach children to solve new math problems
feature2.description1: The Evolytes teach children how to solve new math problems in the books. In each chapter students get step by step instructions on how to solve new math problems with the help of an Evolyte!
feature2.description2: The book is designed by our experienced artists and illustrators with decades experience in design and illustration.

feature3.title: Evolytes books integrate with the platform
feature3.description1: The Evolytes books introduce game elements and animals from the Evolytes universe while teaching children math.
feature3.description2: The books integrate with the game with QR codes at the end of each chapter. The chapters are exams which are directly tied to the content. If students successfully finish the exam they get rewards. Students actively want to get rewards in the game and finish the books in record time. Teachers can see the students progress in the books and the chapters the student struggles with the monitior.

game.subtitle: The Evolytes game rivals the games children play for fun and make slearning math fun and engaging

math.title: Making math fun
math.subtitle: The Evolytes game makes learning math fun through a high quality game, beautiful animals, universe and exciting adventures

explanations.subtitle1: In order to catch, play or compete with other animals children have to answer math questions to do operations
explanations.subtitle2: As children play the game more the animals learn new abilities and evolve
explanations.subtitle3: Choose your character and discover the ever expanding Evolytes universe and it stories
explanations.subtitle4: There are various chests in the world where students have to answer questions to open them and gain rewards!

character.title: Choose your character
character.subtitle: Children get to choose wich character and companion animal to play in the game. Each animal belongs to family of evolutions to choose from.

story.title: Get to know the story
story.subtitle: Children follow the story of 4 unlikely friends who are discovering their Evolyte companions. Get to know their introduction below.

evolve.title: Collect and evolve
evolve.explanation1: Every Evolytes has multiple evolutions which grants every Evolyte unique abilities to discover
evolve.explanation2: Every Evolyte belong to a family tree which outlines its different possible evolutions. Every family has its unique characteristics

engaged.title: Evolytes is designed to keep your child entertained and engaged
engaged.subtitle: Evolytes is based on several years of research and use leading psychological theories to improve learning outcomes and keep your child engaged

platform.title: Evolytes platform
platform.subtitle: Learn more about what makes the evolytes platform special and how the books and monitor make Evolytes a leading math learning platform
platform.booksSubtitle: The evolytes books are specifically designed to teach reading and writing skills and integrate with the game
platform.monitorSubtitle: Get in depth learning insights strengths and weaknesses in real time with the monitor
platform.gameSubtitle: The Evolytes game makes learning math fun and engaging while adapting to your childs skill level to maximize their potential

monitor.subtitle: The monitor give you real time insights into your childs learning progress, strengths and weakness

overview.title: Real time overview
overview.subtitle: Children learn faster and more effectively with Evolytes. Don't take our word for it, follow their progress in real time in the monitor

explanations.subtitle1: Get a clear overview of your childs progress in the dashboard.
explanations.subtitle2: With the activity section in the dashboard you can see usage statistics of your child
explanations.subtitle3: Be up to date on your childs progress in the books and what they are struggling with.
explanations.subtitle4: You can see large patterns based on all of the questions your child has answered.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: The monitor is constantly evolving and offers various features to give you an overview of your childs learning progress, strengths and weaknesses

explanation.title: Real time overview of your childs progress
explanation.subtitle1: The dashboard gives you a simple and effective overview of your childs activity, progress in the books and their latest activity as well as skill evolutions.
explanation.subtitle2: The dashboard is the perfect place to stay up to date on your childs math learning.

skills.title: See you childs skills evolve over time
skills.subtitle: In the monitor you can see how your childs skills evolve over time and how they are progressing. This can help you identify problem areas and stay on top of your childs skill acquisition

book.title: Book progress, chapter exams and rewards
book.subtitle1: With the book and game integration you can get insights into your childs progress in the books, the chapters thay have finished and the chapters thay are struggling with.
book.subtitle2: This feature gives you insight into their progress in the books and identifies problem areas.

answers.title: Get depth analysis in the answers section
answers.subtitle: In the answers section you can filter and analyze all of your childs answers in one place, uncover trends and dificulty areas. This feature is great for children who have involved parents or tutors who want to analyse their answers at a deeper level to understant where problems occur.

Subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
Subscriptions.subtitle: We offer various subscription plans to transform the way your child learns math.
Subscriptions.BookText: Evolytes companion book of your choosing
Subscriptions.shortDescription: Evolytes iPad App and Access to the Evolytes Monitor.

freeTrial.title: Trial
freeTrial.startTrialMessage: You are about to start a 7 day free trial of Evolytes. We do not require a credit card or any payment information. We hope your child enjoys the Evolytes universe and learns as much as possible during your trial!

School.title: Schools
School.subtitle: Evolytes has a special pricing and features specifically designed for schools and their needs. Learn why over 50% of schools in Iceland choose Evolytes!

leftIcon1.title: Evolytes game
leftIcon1.subtitle: All schools get unlimited access to the evolytes game, features and all future updates

leftIcon2.title: Evolytes books

Learning.title: Learning outcomes
Learning.subtitle: Evolytes is based on several years of research and uses leading psychological theories to improve learning outcomes and keep your child engaged
Learning.endingText: Start empowering your child or students with the Evolytes platform today

landing.tagline: Learn math in a fun and engaging way
landing.description: Use the Evolytes game and books to teach children math faster in a fun and engaging way. The platform is designed for children aged 5-8 years old.

evolytesPart.title: Changing the way children learn
evolytesPart.description: The Evolytes platform combines the Evolytes game, books and monitor to improve learning outcomes.
evolytesPart.gameDescription: The Evolytes game makes learning math fun in a open world with various adventures.
evolytesPart.bookDescription: The Evolytes books are specifically designed to develop reading and writing skills.
evolytesPart.monitorDescription: With monitor you can have a real time overview of children learning progress, strengths and weaknesses.

universePart.title: The Evolytes Universe
universePart.description: The Evolytes universe, its characters and stories will keep your child calculating math at an incredible pace.

howPart.title: How Evolytes works
howPart.description1: Children play in the Evolytes game where they answer math questions to advance in the game.
howPart.description2: As the child answers more questions we start adapting the question to its skill level.
howPart.description3: Children work in the books and use the QR codes at the end of each chapter to take an exam and get rewards.
howPart.description4: Teachers and parents can monitor the child's progress, strengths and weaknesses in the monitor.

researchPart.title: Founded in research
researchPart.description: Evolytes is based on several years of research and uses leading psychological theories to improve learning outcomes and keep your child engaged.

theory.reinforcementDescription: Makes the game entertaining and rewards students to keep them engaged
theory.flowDescription: Is used to adapt to the skill level of each and every student to maximize their potential
theory.spacingDescription: Ensures long term learning and skill acquisition by spacing practice

featureSection.title: Feature Requests
featureSection.description: We work closely with our partnering schools to create the best math educational platform out there. If you have any features you would like us to add feel free to reach out, we always love fresh new ideas!

schoolSection.title: Evolytes in Schools
schoolSection.description: Evolytes has a special version and pricing for Schools. Learn why over 50% of schools in Iceland use Evolytes.

1.text: A couple of students have started the Evolytes adventure. This is AMAZING. We have seen tremendous growth immediately from our students! Huge compliments from us! There were several teachers green with envy who want to add their students to the Evolytes platform.

2.text: Usually games that teach you something are childish and boring. Evolytes is not like that...

supportPart.title: Support
supportPart.description: The Evolytes platform received support from the technology development fund and the Innovation center of Iceland which were crucial to the development of the platform.

introduction.title: Evolytes for schools
introduction.subtitle: Evolytes has been specifically designed in for schools in close collaboration with our partners. We want to empower teachers to have modern tools to help their students succeed

tool.title: Tool for teachers
tool.subtitle: The Evolytes platform is designed to empower teachers and students. The monitor gives teachers real time insights into student progress, strenghts and difficulties.
tool.monitorDescription: In the monitor you can have a a real time overview of your childs learning progress, strengths and weaknesses.
tool.gameDescription: Students answer a math question in order to operations in the game such as catching and feeding Evolytes.

engaging.title: Engaging students
engaging.subtitle: The Evolytes game and books are designed to keep students engaged, interested and calculating math based on their skill level to maximize their potential
engaging.individualizedSubtitle1: The core of Evolytes platform is the real time assessment where students are provided with individualized content in real time based on their skill level.
engaging.individualizedSubtitle2: Teachers get a clear overview and insights into the students learning process to address problem areas. The platform saves teaches a great deal of time which goes into student assessment.
engaging.dashboardSubtitle: In the monitor teachers get real time overview and insights into the students learning. The student gets individualized content based on his skill level.

keeping.title: Keeping students engaged
keeping.description1: Evolytes is a high quality game which rivals the games children play for fun in their own free time. The game is designed to make learning math fun and engaging through the Evolytes universe, its stories and characters.
keeping.description2: Students learn faster in the Evolytes game, spend more time learning math at home and are more positive towards math in all its forms.
keeping.pictureSubtitle: Evolytes features a rich open world with dozens of animals, quests and stories to keep students engaged and learning!

books.title: Evolytes books integrate with the platform
books.description1: The Evolytes books introduce game elements and animals from the Evolytes universe while teaching children math.
books.description2: The books integrate with the game with QR codes at the end of each chapter. The chapters are exams which are directly tied to the content. If students successfully finish the exam they get rewards. Students actively want to get rewards in the game and finish the book in record time. Teachers can see the students progress in the books and the chapters the student struggles with in the monitor.
books.pictureSubtitle: The evolytes books are specifically designed to develop reading and writting skills while integrating with the Evolytes game in a unique way.

how.title: How schools are serviced
how.subtitle: Evolytes has a special version of the platform developed for schools with special support and quality service. All schools can get a free trial and courses to try out the platform

freeTrial.title: Free trial
freeTrial.subtitle: Schools can get a free trial to test the platform with a handful of teachers and students for free

how.requestText: When you request a demo you get free account to try for your school and handful of students, you can also request a quote for your schools based on your needs

research.title: Based on research
research.subtitle: Evolytes is based on 3 years of interdisciplinary research in computer science and psychology to make learning fun, engaging and improving skill acquisition. The results of the experiment behind the Evolytes platform exceeded our wildest expectations

aboutUs.title: Changing the way children learn math

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: One of our founders, Mathieu Grettir Skúlason, saw his sister struggle with math at home and realized he could apply his research in psychology to help her learn math. He carried out an experiment which had very encouraging results which led to the development of Evolytes.

y2014.title: Interdisciplinary research which the Evolytes game is based on
y2014.description: The Evolytes game was based on three years of interdisciplinary research in reinforcement theory by Mathieu Grettir Skúlason in the Aperio honors program at Reykjavík University which started in 2014.

y2016.title: Experiment to speed up math skill acquistion
y2016.description: In 2016 Mathieu came home to his sister struggling with math where he realized he could apply his research to make learning math fun and engaging. Following his epiphany he developed a prototype video game which he used in an experiment to see its effect on learning. The results were beyond his wildest expectation.

y2017.title: Golden egg business planning competition - 3rd place
y2017.description: The experimental results were so encouraging that Mathieu took the project to the Golden Egg business planning competition. Jónas Ingi Valdimarsson and Íris Eva Gísladóttir joined the project where they fledged out the vision of the company which would later becomes Evolytes. The project landed in 3rd place out of over 250 other teams.

y2017bis.title: Startup Reykjavík Accelerator and grants
y2017bis.description: Following the Golden Egg business competition the project took part in the Startup Reykjavík business accelerator under the name Flow Education. The project received a capital increase of 2.4M ISK for 6% share in the company as part of their participation in the accelerator. The project got grants from the Technology Development Fund of Iceland and the Innovation Center of Iceland.

y2018.title: Grant received from the technology development fund of Iceland
y2018.description: Evolytes got two year grant, worth 20 million ISK to develop the Evolytes platform and get it to market in Iceland. The grant played a crucial role in making Evolytes what it is today.

y2020.title: Evolytes launched in Iceland at the end of march
y2020.description: Evolytes was released in late march of 2020 with a great reception from consumers. Schools showed a great interest in the platform as Evolytes was used in 15 schools during the school year of 2020-2021.

y2021.title: Evolytes used in over 50% of Icelandic schools
y2021.description: Evolytes is in used by over 50% of all schools in Iceland being the most dominant math learning platform in the country. We’re very excited to change the way children learn and empower teachers with modern tools

team.title: The Team
team.description: The team behind Evolytes has decades a vast interdisciplinary skill set ranging from psychology, pedagogy and research to illustration, game development and software engineering.

exp.title: Experimental Result
exp.conclusion: Students got the Evolytes game to play at home outside of schools hours where it was stressed they had to play it in their own free time. Their performance was compared to their math activity at school.

positiveTowards.title: Positive Towards Math
positiveTowards.descr1: At the end of the study all students had more positive feelings associated with math. No matter the form of math students were more open to studying mathematics.
positiveTowards.descr2: By providing students with individualized content, in a fun and engaging way, students associate positive feelings with math and gain the confidence they need to keep studying.

theoretical.title: Theoretical Foundation
theoretical.description: The Evolytes platform uses several different psychological theories to improve learning, skill acquisition while making the process fun and engaging.

history.title: Research History
history.description: Evolytes is based on several years of research in psychology to make learning fun and engaging

y2014.title: Effects of variable and fixed reinforcement schedules on children’s responding in video games
y2014.descr1: Our first study set out to shed light on responding patterns of children for different reinforcement schedules in video games. Various experiments have shown humans to be insensitive to the schedules and their patterns deviate significantly from what is observed with infrahuman species.
y2014.descr2: The results showed that only fixed ratio had a similar pattern of responding as seen in simpler species. Others schedules showed uncharacteristic responding patterns for variable ratio, fixed interval and variable interval reinforcement schedules.

y2015.title: Effects of age and gender on responding to variable and fixed rates of reinforcement in video games
y2015.descr1: After having studied the responding patterns in our first experiment we wanted set out to see if age and gender has an effect on resonding patterns under different rates of reinforcement.
y2015.descr2: The results showed that age had an effect on responding patterns, specifically the rate of reinforcement and how long participants were active throughout the reinforcement schedule. Younger kids showed greater sensitivity to the different reinforcement schedules than older ones. This may be due to the fact that kids have a shorter reinforcement history than older students.

y2016.title: Applied reinforcement theory in video games to speed up mathematical skill acquisition
y2016.descr1: Based on our prior experiments we created a video game based on an optimal reinforcement strategy to incentivize 4th grade students to learn math faster at home in their own free time.
y2016.descr2: The results showed that students answered on average 4x more questions in the game compared to the same period at school and up to 1200 questions a day. Students with learning disabilities showed the greatest growth where students answered up to 12x more questions compared to at school. At the end of the study all students were more positive towards math.

contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.description: If you have any question or issues we can help with feel free to contact us and we will get back to you.

profileSettings.profileDesc: Here you can manage majority of the settings surrounding your account.
profileSettings.infoDesc: This information is used to contact you and authenticate your account.
profileSettings.languageDesc: You can change your language settings. If you need to change regions you will have to contact us via email.
profileSettings.deleteDesc: Deleting account is permanent and it deletes all child accounts associated with it and cancels all subscriptions. This action cannot be undone.

passwordSettings.passwordDesc: Here you can change your password authentication and other authentications as they are added.
passwordSettings.changeDesc: Input your current password and confirm it with your new password.

newBillingSettings.billingDesc: Here you can see the billing status for different child accounts. In order to get your billing history for each account go to manage billing for that account.
newBillingSettings.childDesc: Here you can see the billing status for different child accounts and manage them

accountsSettings.accountsDesc: You can edit the information for your child accounts such as names, language amonst other information.
accountsSettings.childDesc: Manage the names, languages and other settings for your child accounts.

authSettings.authDesc: Below you can activate and use different authentication methods for your student or child. You can still login through your own account. This is an additional authentication mechanism for child/student accounts only.
authSettings.childDesc: Manage the different authentication mechanisms for your child accounts
authSettings.qrCodeDesc: You can use a QR code so that the child can login to their account in the Evolytes game. The QR Code works like a password so if a third party gets ahold of it you can generate a new one and invalidate the old code. You can print the code and keep where your child has easy access to it
authSettings.pinDesc: If you have multiple child accounts you can add a four number PIN so that children or students cannot switch between accounts. In order to get into the selected account the child or student will have to use their PIN.
authSettings.emailDesc: If your child has an email account you can create an email and password, you will need to confirm the email so that your child can login with it into the game.
